recipesJson.name: Poached Pears
recipesJson.author: shakenvape007
recipesJson.description:
Nice simple Poached Pear recipe that can sure be a ADV. I love Molinberry Shape Up Pear and wanted to show how great this flavor is. 
Check out the video on facebook and youtube enjoy!! 

Check us out on facebook..  New mixers always welcome!! https://www.facebook.com/groups/456512471380574
Check us out on youtube..  Recipe here mixed Live  ----->  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mXIGfV9Hgyg
